Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using shell commands, but received errors indicating that necessary files were not found. Despite trying multiple commands and paths, I continued to receive the same errors. In my latest attempt, I tried various paths using different conda versions, but all returned errors indicating that the necessary files were not found. Multiple AI responses indicated that the commands were executed, but all action results returned errors indicating that the necessary files were not found in the specified directories. Specifically, I attempted to activate the environment using different paths and versions of conda, but all returned errors stating that the necessary files were not found in the specified directories.
"""
